event.title: is named after Bob and Bernice Arnold, who, in 1927

data.event: Arnold is named after Bob and Bernice Arnold, who, in 1927 opened the Ebbetts Pass Inn.
In 1928, Camp Wolfeboro was established nearby as a Boy Scout camp and continues to be in operation today.

event.title: continues to be in operation today

data.event: In 1928, Camp Wolfeboro was established nearby as a Boy Scout camp and continues to be in operation today.
The first post office was opened in 1934.
The 2010 United States Census reported that Arnold had a population of 3,843.
